mapper.sql: SELECT cra.ID, cra.COMPUTER_APPLY_NO as computerApplyNo, cra.APPLY_USER_ID as applyUserId, (SELECT PNAME FROM OG_PERSON WHERE OG_PERSON.PID =cra.APPLY_USER_ID ) as applyUserName, cra.APPLY_ORG_ID as applyOrgId, cra.AUDITOR_ID as auditorId, (SELECT PNAME FROM OG_PERSON WHERE OG_PERSON.PID =cra.AUDITOR_ID ) as auditorName, org.ORGNAME as applyOrgName, cra.COMPUTER_ROOM_MODULE as computerRoomModule, cra.COMPUTER_ROOM_MODULE_NAME as computerRoomModuleName, cra.ACCOMPANY_USER_ID as accompanyUserId , (SELECT PNAME FROM OG_PERSON WHERE OG_PERSON.PID =cra.ACCOMPANY_USER_ID ) as accompanyUserName, cra.ACCOMPANYUSERIDTWO as accompanyUserIdTwo, (SELECT PNAME FROM OG_PERSON WHERE OG_PERSON.PID =cra.ACCOMPANYUSERIDTWO ) as accompanyUserNameTwo, cra.PREDICT_IN_TIME as predictInTime, cra.PREDICT_OUT_TIME as predictOutTime, cra.WORK_CONTENT_IDS as workContentIds, cra.WORK_CONTENT as workContent, cra.WORK_DESCRIPTION as workDescription, cra.APPLY_STATE as applyState, cra.REGISTER_ACCOMPANY_USER_NAME as registerAccompanyUserName, cra.REGISTER_TIME as registerTime, cra.REASON as reason, cra.IS_TEMPORARY as isTemporary, cra.INTO_NAME as intoName, cra.INTO_IDNUMBER as intoIdNumber, cra.INTO_PHONE as intoPhone, cra.INTO_UNIT as intoUnit, cra.IS_BELONGINGS as isBelongings, cra.BELONGINGS as belongings, cra.BELONGINGSNUM as belongingsNum, cra.INOUTTYPE as inOutType, cra.INSTALLSITE as installSite, cra.IS_URGENCY as isUrgency, cra.REMARK as remark, cra.COMPUTERCENTER as computerCenter, cm.NAME as computerCenterName, cra.ACCOMPANYUSERONE as accompanyUserOne, cra.CREATE_TIMES as createTimes, cra.UPDATE_TIMES as updateTimes, cra.REALITYINTO_TIME as realityIntoTime, cra.REALITYOUTTO_TIME as realityOuttoTime, cra.REALITYINTOPERSONNEL as realityIntoPersonnel, cra.REALITY_BELONGINGS as realityBelongings, cra.REALITY_BELONGINGS_NUM as realityBelongingsNum, cra.REALITY_MODULE as realityModule, cra.REGISTER_NAME as registerName FROM COMPUTER_ROOM_APPLY cra LEFT JOIN COMPUTER_MODULE cm ON cra.COMPUTERCENTER = cm.ID LEFT JOIN OG_ORG org ON cra.APPLY_ORG_ID = org.ORGID
mapper.insert:
insert into COMPUTER_ROOM_APPLY
ID, COMPUTER_APPLY_NO, APPLY_USER_ID, APPLY_ORG_ID, COMPUTER_ROOM_MODULE, COMPUTER_ROOM_MODULE_NAME, ACCOMPANY_USER_ID, PREDICT_IN_TIME, PREDICT_OUT_TIME, WORK_CONTENT_IDS, WORK_CONTENT, WORK_DESCRIPTION, APPLY_STATE, REGISTER_TIME, REASON, AUDITOR_ID, CREATE_TIMES, UPDATE_TIMES, IS_TEMPORARY, INTO_NAME, INTO_IDNUMBER, INTO_PHONE, INTO_UNIT, IS_BELONGINGS, BELONGINGS, IS_URGENCY, REMARK, COMPUTERCENTER, ACCOMPANYUSERONE, ACCOMPANYUSERIDTWO, BELONGINGSNUM, INOUTTYPE, INSTALLSITE,
#{id}, #{computerApplyNo}, #{applyUserId}, #{applyOrgId}, #{computerRoomModule}, #{computerRoomModuleName}, #{accompanyUserId}, #{predictInTime}, #{predictOutTime}, #{workContentIds}, #{workContent}, #{workDescription}, #{applyState}, #{registerTime}, #{reason}, #{auditorId}, #{createTimes}, #{updateTimes}, #{isTemporary}, #{intoName}, #{intoIdNumber}, #{intoPhone}, #{intoUnit}, #{isBelongings}, #{belongings}, #{isUrgency}, #{remark}, #{computerCenter}, #{accompanyUserOne}, #{accompanyUserIdTwo}, #{belongingsNum}, #{inOutType}, #{installSite},
insert into COMPUTER_MODULE( id, parent_id, name, create_id, status, create_time )values( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{name}, #{createId}, #{status}, #{createTime} )
mapper.select:
SELECT p.PID,p.PNAME,org.ORGNAME FROM OG_PERSON p LEFT JOIN OG_ORG org ON p.ORGID = org.ORGID
p.INVALIDATION_MARK = '1' and org.ORGCODE IN ('010107888','010302888')
and p.PNAME like concat('%',concat(#{pName},'%'))
and org.ORGNAME like concat('%',concat(#{orgname},'%'))
select p.value as workContentIds ,p.value_detail as workContent from pub_paravalue p where p.para_id in (select p2.para_id from pub_para p2 where p2.para_name = #{paraName}) order by p.serail asc

select k.id, k.parent_id, k.name, k.create_time, k.create_id,k.status, (select pname from og_person p where p.pid=k.create_id) as create_name, k2.name as parent_name from COMPUTER_MODULE k left join COMPUTER_MODULE k2 on k2.id=k.parent_id where k.id = #{id}
select k.id, k.parent_id, k.name, k.create_time, k.create_id,k.status from COMPUTER_MODULE k WHERE PARENT_ID IS NULL order by k.create_time

select distinct concat(concat(concat(concat(og.orgname,'-'),pe.pname),'-'),pe.mobil_phone) as pname,u.username,u.userid,u.INVALIDATION_MARK,pe.pname,pe.mobil_phone,og.orgname,u.pid,pe.sex from OG_USER u left join OG_PERSON pe on u.pid = pe.pid left join og_org og on pe.orgid = OG.orgid LEFT join og_r_user_post up on u.userid = up.userid LEFT JOIN og_post p on p.postid = up.postid where p.postid = #{postId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and pe.invalidation_mark='1'
